summary:
Educated at Technical Universities in Poland and in The Netherlands
Over 30 years of experience in: subsea pipeline/structures design/engineering/installation, dredging and marine operations while working for major pipeline engineering, dredging and marine construction companies in different countries..
Presently with INTECSEA, (Netherlands) World Leading Subsea Engineering Company of Worley Group involved in design and construction of most major subsea gas transmission  pipelines and Oil & Gas subsea and presently offshore renewable developments.
